zerg rush

How does one get to orbit

With the FTL egg thingy

How does one make a kerbals-catapult?

mainsails

how dose one blow up a planet

Exterminatus...

How does One became and emperor?

by being the GOD EMPEROR on his toilet throne...

how does one solve riddles

Google.

How does one solve riddles without cheating?

He can't

How does one know the Internet by heart

stick an internet cable into either the heart or the brain.

how does one develop telekinesis

Chalk, a few dead bodies, a disembodied brain, six bars of electrum and gold dust. Oh, and an incantation.

How does one fold space to make a wormhole?

Carefully and crisply.

How do you unfold space?

You don't; space unfolds you.

How do you fix torn duct tape?

...carefully.

How do you lithobrake without breaking anything?

Jeb.

How do you keep snacks away from kerbals?

Putting the snacks away from the kerbal. IE: Putting it on top of an BACC SRB and launching it into a "kerbolecentric" orbit.

How would you fly a rocket without any probe core, command pod, or the like?

Aim it upwards.

How would you send such a thing into orbit?

Put the snack a little off centre, gravity should do the rest!

Do we use a rubber based glue or a hotmelt one?

rubber becuase why not

do you push the button?

I don't put myself as the guy to blame when things blow up.

How does one sabotage a launch?

One "forgets" to put some structs...

How does one saves his/her kerbals?

One, "Mericfully" kill them

How does one gain money

they take a bribe and win a bet

how does one learn kerbal

By SRBs, duct tape and Whackjob magic.

How would you make Jeb sad?

By cutting budgets on SRB development.

How does one land on the Moho-hole?

by using a platform ,and KAS

How does one make a steam engine work?

with victorian engineering.

how do I make friends?
